# Namespace

## Usage
`@namespace [[{<type>}] <SomeName>]`
 
## Overview
Indicates that an object creates a namespace for its members.

## Example
```javascript
/** 
 * @namespace
 */
var Tools = {};

/** 
 * @memberof Tools 
 */
var hammer = function() {
};

Tools.hammer = hammer;
```

**[_More Info_](http://usejsdoc.org/tags-namespace.html)**
